casebody.data:
Paul E. LOWENTHAL, Plaintiff in Error, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. November 21, 1924.) No. 64. Harold Lee, of New York City, for plaintiff in error. William Hayward, U. S. Atty., of New York City, and Elmer H. Lemon, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Middletown, N. Y.

Before HOUGH and MAN-TON, Circuit Judges, and LEARNED HAND, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
